ygData.subject: Re: PoA bard quests plus a rant
ygData.msgSnippet: Heh quite simple I believe it a was a enchanter, cleric, bard , shaman, druid and a ranger. Not postiive but I believe that was the class. People do things
ygData.messageBody:
Heh quite simple I believe it a was a enchanter, cleric, bard , shaman,
druid and a ranger. Not postiive but I believe that was the class. People do
things that really aren't hard like brining 10 people to do the lord room or
3 full groups to do efreeti. I've found that most people just don't know how
to effectively play their class to the full potential.

Naeeldar

-----Original Message-----
From: JasonF <JasonF@...>
To: eqbards@onelist.com <eqbards@onelist.com>
Date: Thursday, January 27, 2000 5:46 PM
Subject: RE: [eqbards] PoA bard quests plus a rant


>From: "JasonF" <JasonF@...>
>
>Wait a second. We're talking about Seafury Cyclops right? In OOT? If so
I
>don't see how a single group could keep that island clear unless perhaps
>that was a group of six necros soloing. Those things spawn *rediculously*
>fast. Earlier I said they pop like Moss Snakes and I meant it. Perhaps
>your server is different, but I've never seen that island cleared of
cyclops
>even with three high 40s groups working it.
>
>[44 Bard] Crier (Half Elf) <Seekers of Norrath> ZONE: work
>
>> Heh even without necros I think my necro and a 42 enchanter
>> friend kept the
>> isle basically cleared. Often times I'll go there and they'll will be one
>> group who keeps it cleared without necros. Just need to have the
>> right group
>> for it. Besides which as I stated that place is camped like mad and they
>> recently lowered exp that you get from furies.
>>
>> Naeeldar
>
